Package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.internal

Class PatchedTransaction

java.lang.Object
org.bitcoinj.core.Message
org.bitcoinj.core.ChildMessage
org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction
org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing.internal.PatchedTransaction
public class PatchedTransaction extends Transaction
Subclass of Transaction that adds a subset of PR #2274 See https://github.com/bitcoinj/bitcoinj/pull/2274
